creator: raveendra_kumar@yahoo.com
text:
Currently Quote option of FTP is not supported. This is very useful option that
can enable to use Ant for building and submitting the IBM mainframe (ZOS) batch
tasks. Currently using this option, it is possible to directly submit mainframe
jobs into Job Entry Subsystem (JES). This feature can be used for buliding
"bridging" tasks such as compilations from eclipse IDE for COBOL,C and C++.
Additionally it can also be used for other tasks such as deploying the Java
programs on to mainframes.
